posts.title: Motion Reel 2020
posts.subtitle: Compilation
posts.description: A collection of some of my work over the past 2 years. This includes personal pieces and projects for Metro.co.uk & Headspace.

posts.title: Headspace
posts.subtitle: Guided Meditations
posts.description: A series of looping animations to play alongside guided meditations. Each of the 4 final scenarios were completed between 1-2 working days. A compliation can be seen at the beginning of my reel.

posts.title: My Odd Job
posts.subtitle: Series Ident
posts.description: An ident for a series of interviews with people in, well, odd jobs. As the jobs would be in a mixture of industries the choice was to make the ident in a clean semi-industrial style, with the handwritten touch and serif font to add personality.

posts.title: Scrapped
posts.subtitle: Personal Work
posts.description: Originally was being developed as an intro to a series, but continued once it was scrapped. The girl's animation is mostly frame-by-frame, reconstructed with additional tweening in After Effects.

posts.title: Pond Time
posts.subtitle: Personal Work
posts.description: I originally worked on this to try and get a blend between realistic and cartoonish water. This included experimenting with combining grain and gradients, generating random reactive shapes for the as well as displacement tools for ripples.

posts.title: Editing Reel 2020
posts.subtitle: Compilation
posts.description: Clips from projects both professional and personal. All footage shot, graded, edited by me.

posts.title: Playlist Picks
posts.subtitle: Music Interview Series
posts.description: An interview series that involved guests such as Busted, Peter Andre, Steven Yeun, and Zak Able building music playlists. All episodes were shot, edited, and released within the same day. Acted as Producer, Camera operator, editor, graphics, and music

posts.title: ViewRanger Stories
posts.subtitle: Mini-Documentary Series
posts.description: A series of 11 mini-documentaries that followed users of the GPS tracking app ViewRanger. After the series I also edited a trailer for the app using the footage collected from the shoots alongside additional graphics.

posts.title: Deepfakes
posts.subtitle: Journalism Feature
posts.description: A look into Deepfake technology.The piece includes a simple explanation of nerual networks, their applications, and how this has manifested into Deep Fake videos.
